page.title: 08Direct Communications
page.content: {Citizen Band Radios}are essential for Emergency Services to do their job.In both the fire and police stations in Carnoustie there are 2 C.B.sets.The police have used them for 17 years,the fire station has used them for at least 8 years.Taxis in Carnoustie use 2-way radios. The{telephone}is convenient for local communication.In Carnoustie there is a telephone exchange for the area.This means that a whisper from Carnoustie can travel around the world.From a sample we estimate that 88% of homes in the area have tele- phones. For less urgent communication there is the{Royal Mail.}Carnoustie's Post Office takes in about 5000 letters a day.A Ford Escort van is mostly used for deliveries.A new stamp with a Safety at Sea theme is due on 18.6.85.
